heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny. Valley highs in the mid to upper 70s southeast, low to mid 70s elsewhere south; mid 60s to lower 70s north. North winds 5 to 15 mph, occasionally gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clear skies. Risk of frost mainly in northern cold hollows, and patchy valley fog east of the Greens. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s south and in the Champlain Valley, mid to upper 30s elsewhere north, except around 30 in the cold hollows. North winds diminishing to 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly sunny after any early fog. Valley highs in the low to mid 60s southeast and in the Hudson Valley, upper 50s to lower 60s elsewhere south and in the broad northern valleys, and mid to upper 50s elsewhere north. North winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
